dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: What business do you have here, intruder?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I mean no harm. I just seek passage through this land.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Pah! Your words are as deceitful as the living. Be gone before I decide to rid the world of you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I can offer you something of value in exchange for safe passage.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Value? What value does a mere mortal have that would interest me? Speak quickly or prepare to face your end.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I possess knowledge of ancient burial grounds where treasures lie untouched.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Treasures you say? Tell me more... Very well, mortal, guide me to these grounds, and perhaps I will spare your life.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have nothing else to offer. I will leave peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As I thought, a coward without substance. Leave now and remember the mercy I have shown.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no treasure, but I can challenge you in combat if that's what you seek.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A challenge? How amusing. Very well, mortal, show me what you're made of!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Prepare yourself, foul creature! Let's settle this now!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bravery, or foolishness? We shall see. Face my wrath!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense your power, and I choose to retreat. This isn't worth my life.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ha! Running like the coward you are. Go, but know that I'll remember this encounter.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave peacefully. There's no need for bloodshed.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice, mortal. Your life will be spared... for now.
